description: Number of performances of n fragments in Stockhausen problem.
references: Read, Ronald C. and Yen, Lily, A note on the Stockhausen problem, J. Comb. Theory, Ser. A 76, No. 1, 1-10.
links: R. C. Read, Combinatorial problems in theory of music, Discrete Math. 167 (1997), 543-551.
mathematica: Table[n*Sum[Binomial[n-1,i]*(2*i)!*i*(2*i-1)/2^i,{i,0,n-1}],{n,1,20}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 18 2015 after R. C. Read *)
author: _Lily Yen_
